name: Spider: Rite of the Shrouded Moon
description: You are a spider. Craft webs of your own design to trap insects and leave the mysterious Blackbird Estate covered in cobwebs. This unique blend of action-puzzle gameplay takes you on a dark adventure through an abandoned mansion built by a secret society.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Intel Core i3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Anything with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
